description: There was outrage after the restaurant of the late French chef Paul Bocuse lost one of its stars.
title: Paul Bocuse: Famed chef's restaurant loses three-star rating after 55 years
title_page: Paul Bocuse: Famed chef's restaurant loses three-star rating after 55 years - BBC News
maintext: "Although upset by the inspectors' judgment, there is one thing that we never want to lose, it is the soul of Mr Paul," the restaurant and Bocuse's family said in a statement.
